name: Antipole DX
description:
Antipole DX features fast-paced, retro platforming action, using gravity manipulation!
You control the power of gravity in this sci-fi adventure! Generate gravity fields with the Antipole device to defeat vicious robots, solve puzzles and run on ceilings as you jump and shoot through the game.
  • Reverse gravity in the area around you for short periods of time to climb higher and jump further.
  • The gravity field that you generate can affect many things - enemies, objects, and even acid pools will fall along the new direction of gravity.
  • If you can master the power of the Antipole, you can unlock new challenge stages that test your skills.
  • See if you can clear stages fast enough to be on the online leaderboards!
